mapper.select: select review_num, review_id, review_star, review_content, DATE_FORMAT(review_postdate, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS review_postdate from review where review_deleted_yn = 'N' order by review_num DESC
mapper.insert: insert into review (review_star, review_content, review_id, review_postdate) values (#{reviewStar}, #{reviewContent}, 'test2', now())
